texts.content:
From: Student Services
To: All Students
Subject: Library Hours Change

Dear Students,

The main library will be closed for renovation from March 15 to March 22. The Science Library on the north campus will be open 7 AM to midnight, Monday through Sunday.

All library resources can be accessed digitally through the student portal.

Thank you.

questions.stem: Why is the main library closing?
options: C. It is switching to digital-only access.
questions.explanation: The email states the library will be closed 'for renovation.'

questions.stem: What can be inferred about students during the closure?
options: A. They will have no access to library materials.
B. They must visit the north campus for all services.
C. They can still access library resources online.
D. They need special permission to use the Science Library.
questions.explanation: Resources are available 'digitally through the student portal.'
